data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module I'm currently working on will allow users to create a
    new WML page, with one line of code. They can then print out
    information from their HTML database, or something new, use the
    module easily convert HTML code to the appropirate WML script, and
    then end the page.

    Allowing anyone to easily run a WML information site or even a
    dynamic site as the one that was built here:
    http://www.mcarterbrown.com/index.wml where I have a Wireless Mesage
    Board, and a Wireless Multiple Chat rooms, built on the basis of
    this module.

    The other modules that I listed above are also good. But also very
    complex. So complex so, that you really need to know WML well.

    I'm writing it so that even the most novice module user can easily
    create a WML page, hence the WML::Easy
